title: Worlds In Australia
body: Who else is waiting for information about watching worlds in cinemas? It almost feels like they won't even be bringing it to us. Riot Please give this to us{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: After last years colossal fuck up across multiple major cinemas, i doubt they're gonna play it in cinemas again
That was the event cinemas, give it to Hoyts it was so much better
